sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p:
SPELDHURST, a large parish in the hundred of Washlingstone and county of Kent, thirty-three miles distant from London. A great part of the township of Tunbridge
Wells is comprehended in it, to which circumstance it owes its increased inhabitants, who were, in 1801, 1618; in 1811, 1901 ; in i821, 2297; and in 1831, 2640.
